Second Edition Plan

Continuous improvement to provide students with better reading experience and content value

  1. Correct spelling mistakes

    Task 1

    Correct the spelling mistakes that have already been found in this book.

  2. Ensure the content is updated

    Task 2

    Update the content to better align with the new version of the UNSW Foundation textbook.

  3. Layout Optimization

    Task 3

    Revise the layout based on the feedback to enhance readability and mobile experience
